lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw n bIcwrq ibkwr suq poKq spRym ibhsq ibhswie kY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Maataa Pitaa N Beechaarat Bikaar Souta , Pokhat Sapraym Bihasat Bihasaai Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as the parents take no notice of the faults of their son and bring him up in happy and pleasant atmosphere.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy biRQwvMq jMq bYdih biRqwNq khY prK prIKw aupcwrq rswie kY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Bridaavant Jant Baidahi Britaant Kahai , Parakh Pareekhaa Oupachaarat Rasaai Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a patient suffering from pain explains his ailment to the physician, ignoring his carelessness in maintaining his health, the physician administers medicine lovingly after thorough investigation,

lines.gurmukhi: ctIAw Anyk jYsy eyk citswr ibKY ibidAwvMq krY pwDw pRIiq sY pVwie kY
lines.transliteration_english: Chateeaa Anayk Jaisay Ayk Chatisaar Bikhai , Bidiaavant Karai Paadhaa Preeti Sai Parhaai Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as there are many students in a school, the teacher does not look into their childish pranks and nuisance but teaches them devotedly to make them knowledgeable,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurisKn kY Aaugun AvigAw mytY bHm ibbyk sY shj smJwie kY ]378]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gursikhan Kai Aougoun Avagiaa Maytai , Braham Bibayk Sai Sahaj Samajhaai Kai ?378?

Shabad OS B.translation: So does the True Guru bless the Sikhs in His refuge with divine knowledge and high state of equipoise, thus obliterating their ill deeds performed in ignorance.  (378)
